programme.title: Kidnap Syndicate
programme.desc: Based on an actual event "The Kidnap Syndicate" is the story of two boys, one from a rich family and the other from a poor family, who are kidnapped and held for ransom.

programme.title: Come niente
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Greta and 11-year-old Caterina, spend the summer with their grandfather Franco, who survived a major earthquake in central Italy.

programme.title: Stunt Squad
programme.desc: In the city of Bologna, the dangerous bandit Valli, with his group, runs an extortion racket by terrorizing merchants. On the gang's trail comes Police Commissioner Grifi, kicking off a long hunt for the extortionists and murderers.

programme.title: Go for it
programme.desc: Two men meet in a strange situation and end up being mistaken first for robbers, then for Secret Service agents.

programme.title: Plot of fear
programme.desc: A detective uncovers chilling secrets in a tense murder mystery filled with intrigue

programme.title: Bad Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: A man brings his best friend along when he has to be introduced to his girlfriend's terrifying family, a family that turns out to be even more terrifying than expected.

programme.title: Appassionata
programme.desc: A passionate and forbidden love story that unfolds between two characters from different walks of life.

programme.title: It isn't is true... but I believe it
programme.desc: A superstitious entrepreneur hires a "lucky" man, only to face an unexpected turn of fate.

programme.title: Provocation
programme.desc: Vanessa, widowed at a young age, lives with her step-daughters Kikki and Vivi in a luxurious villa on the island of San Pietro. They have recently moved in with Roberto, a professor and former lover of Vanessa's, who is in charge of giving private lessons to the two girls in preparation for their high school exams. Inside the mansion there is constant tension, a climate of hatred in which the man will become involved despite himself with increasingly tragic consequences.
